mapper.sql: MENU_ID, UP_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_URL, MENU_ICON, MENU_SORT, MENU_EXT_CODE
mapper.select:
select
from BASE_MENU
UP_MENU_ID = #{upMenuId}
AND MENU_NAME like '%$menuName%'
mapper.insert: insert into BASE_MENU (MENU_ID, UP_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_URL, MENU_ICON, MENU_SORT, MENU_EXT_CODE) values (BASE_MENU_SEQ.nextval(), #{upMenuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{menuExtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into BASE_MENU
MENU_ID,
UP_MENU_ID,
MENU_NAME,
MENU_LEVEL,
MENU_URL,
MENU_ICON,
MENU_SORT,
MENU_EXT_CODE,

mapper.update:
update BASE_MENU
UP_MENU_ID = #{upMenuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_ICON = #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_SORT = #{menuSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MENU_EXT_CODE = #{menuExtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BASE_MENU set UP_MENU_ID = #{upMenuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_LEVEL = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ICON = #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_SORT = #{menuSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MENU_EXT_CODE = #{menuExtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
